page.title: Buy a Hardware wallet
page.desc: Purchase a hardware wallet for the highest security when accessing your crypto.

desc.ledger: A light, yet solid multicurrency hardware wallet for cryptocurrencies. It is easy to carry everywhere thanks to its USB format.
desc.finney: Uncompromised Security In a Blockchain Smartphone
desc.bitbox: Our aim is to equip you for independence, with ease, in the digital world.
desc.trezor: The most trusted hardware wallet in the world. Get yours today!
desc.keepkey: Protect your cryptocurrencies, store your private keys offline, and safeguard your assets from hackers.
desc.bcvault: Gain full control of your private keys. Backup, Encrypt, Export, Delete. Your choice.
desc.coolwallet: Security in the size of a credit card. Connect via Bluetooth to an iOS or Android app on your smartphone.
